vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (bool success, bytes memory data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(SELECTOR, to, value));
vulnerability_findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.

vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
